meanings.definition: A person who saves someone from a dangerous or difficult situation.
meanings.sent1: The brave rescuers pulled the hiker to safety.
meanings.sent2: The rescuers arrived just in time to save the drowning swimmer.
meanings.sent3: The rescuers joked that they were like superheroes with capes.
meanings.sent4: The rescuers were like guardian angels appearing out of nowhere.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rescuers carrying the injured dog stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people who save others from harm or danger.
meanings.sent1: The rescuers worked together to free the trapped miners.
meanings.sent2: The rescuers formed a human chain to reach the stranded family.
meanings.sent3: The rescuers shared a pizza after their successful mission.
meanings.sent4: The rescuers were a beacon of hope in the dark night.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the rescuers' cheers echoed through the valley.
